MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA4 postcode area of Renfrew. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:24pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations are required and we are installing fault finding equipment to the electrical network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:49 PM on Tuesday, 23 February 2021.
